heading: HB05510
0: AN ACT RESETTING THE 2017 BARANGAY ELECTIONS TO THE LAST MONDAY OF MAY 2018, AND EVERY FIVE YEARS THEREAFTER, AND SETTING THE TERM OF OFFICE OF ELECTED BARANGAY AND SANGGUNIANG KABATAAN OFFICIALS TO FIVE YEARS

history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05510
FULL TITLE : AN ACT RESETTING THE 2017 BARANGAY ELECTIONS TO THE LAST MONDAY OF MAY 2018, AND EVERY FIVE YEARS THEREAFTER, AND SETTING THE TERM OF OFFICE OF ELECTED BARANGAY AND SANGGUNIANG KABATAAN OFFICIALS TO FIVE YEARS
